wikipedia_page.main: Edwin Alfred Marshall (21 August 1904 – 28 January 1970) was an English first-class cricketer active 1937–38 who played for Nottinghamshire. He was born and died in Nottingham.

response: *Edwin Marshall (cricketer) (active 1937–1945), English cricketer, played for Nottinghamshire
*Roy Marshall (Roy Edwin Marshall, 1930–1992), West Indian cricketer
*Edwin Marshall Klein, unsuccessful candidate in Liverpool City Council election, 1980
*Edwin Marshall & Sons, English company, builder of Trafford Town Hall in 1931–1933
